reviewText: I have just ordered this video off of an EBAY listing ($9.00) and am hoping it will finally have some VIDEO FOOTAGE of his interrogation back in 1978 or at the very least additional video of him discussing his case with anyone of the police, psychiatrists/psychologists,lawyers, etc... from 1979, 1980, 1981, 1982, 1983, 1984, etc...I am an avid collector of all things Gacy and have amassed a very big collection of him, particularly books, videos, miscellaneous stuff, etc...but HAVE YET to see a photo of him from the 1980 trial. Why is this?! Good grief, how frustrating..!
